CombineGermlineCNVCalls.cnmops_cnvs_bed.description: cn.mops CNV calls in bed format

CombineGermlineCNVCalls.cnvpytor_cnvs_be.description: cnvpytor CNV calls in bed format

CombineGermlineCNVCalls.deletions_length.description: Minimum length of deletions to be considered without jalign support. default=3000

CombineGermlineCNVCalls.distance_thresho.description: Distance threshold for merging CNV calls. default=1500

CombineGermlineCNVCalls.duplication_leng.description: Minimum length of duplications to be considered for cn.mops calls. default=10000

CombineGermlineCNVCalls.jalign_written_c.description: Minimal number of supporting jaligned reads for deletions. default=1

CombineGermlineCNVCalls.reference_genome.description: Genome fasta file associated with the CRAM file
Fai index of the fasta file
